text: Michael Paul Jakubo (July 7, 1947 – April 4, 2019) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played as a left winger. He played for the Los Angeles Sharks in the World Hockey Association. He was also a member of the independent team called the London Lions which played the 1973–74 season against the top European hockey teams. He was born in Sudbury, Ontario. Jakubo died on April 4, 2019 in Sudbury, Ontario from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease. He was 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Ice hockey people from Greater Sudbury
title: Mike Jakubo (ice hockey)
